comment._content: definitely preferred it without the "Bar Food" sign, but nice to know its still open as a hotel.http://www.leenanehotel.com/

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: The sepia toned picture at the hotel's website shows the building of the bit of the hotel we're looking at! It looks absolutely brand new in this image, I don't think it's even had a coat of whitewash yet.

comment.author: 20727502@N00
comment._content: Coincidentally drove past the hotel (twice) last weekend. Was actually hoping to stop in and have some lunch. But was disappointed that it was completely shut for the season. Sign on the door (immediately behind the guy in the deck chair) said they weren't reopening til March...
